original_title: East Meets West: Filmmakers Crossing Borders
overview: Short documentary included in the Highlander: The Search for Vengeance DVD.  An interesting look at the process of bringing this American franchise over to Japan and gives a good idea at what it took to see it through to completion. Along the same lines there is an interview with Director Yoshiaki Kawajiri where he talks about his experience with working on the picture.
title: East Meets West: Filmmakers Crossing Borders
